name: Yellow Ember
description:
For 300 years, the Han Dynasty has ruled over ZhongGuo, yet their golden age has passed... Fed up with the lies and corruption, Jiu Zhu joins a taoist movement set on revoking their Mandate of Heaven: the Yellow Turban Rebellion ! Not all was well, however...

Having lost the battle of Guangzong, with her master dying in her arms, Jiu Zhu has to escape, or she will perish with the revolution.
